body.name: SunsGrove 4 Drawer Dresser, Modern Chest of Drawers, with Wood Storage Organizer Dressers for Bedroom, Hallway, Children's Room, and Living Room, White
features: 【Spacious Storage Space】The chest of the drawer has different sizes containing 15" inch and 32" inch drawers, and the design fits in a space-conscious layout to maximize storage. 4 wide drawers can organize anything from shirts, socks, and hats to diapers and toys, and now you can sort your clothes and never rummage through the closet again.
【Safety Design】The dresser attaches the anti-toppling fitting to the wall to avoid tipping over and wobbling. This design ensures your family's safety concerns.

【Multipurpose Usage】The 4 drawer dresser need not be limited to the bedroom, with a modern design that complements any space. You can put it in your entryway underneath a mirror or use it in your living room or closet to showcase your decorative taste.

【Quality Assurance】The wooden dresser is made of high-quality medium density fibreboard (MDF), durable, and easy to clean. The 4 drawers have been carefully processed and equipped with slient sliding rails to prevent jams and are easy to use, and the closed drawer storage can effectively prevent dust.

【Product Information】The load-bearing capacity with 220 LBS, with a measurement of 39.4"L x 15.8"W x 30"H inches. The package has a clear assembly document that will guide you through all the steps. If you have questions during the assembly, do not hesitate to contact SunsGrove for immediate support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SunsGrove White Dresser There are messy items all over the room. Don't know where to start? Add a chest that combines the pure color appearance with the simple line design, and it can be well matched with the room decoration. The 2 medium drawers at the top can store cosmetics, jewelry and delicate household items, and the 2 large drawers can sort your clothes, sheets, blankets and books. Place it in your bedroom or apartment to make your room look neater and more refined. The wooden tabletop of the white dressing table provides an open space for displaying room diffusers, books, bouquets. Color: WhiteStyle: ModernMaterial: MDFOverall Dimensions: 39.4"L x 15.8"W x 30"HPackage Includes: Black Dresser, Instruction, Accessories Bag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comes in 2 boxes!
reviews.reviewText: Aside from the fact that it arrived in 2 boxes almost a week apart and bunch of thinking I got a dud, I finally have a new dresser for my son! The seller was wonderful working threw the missing pieces and finally realizing I was missing a box. The dresser it's self feels sturdy, looks nice, and is a good size. I'm very pleased with this purchase. It was kinda a pain to put together solely because it took me forever and I used a normal screw driver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This a decent dresser for the money. Assembly is straightforward and only requires a few simple tools.. Everything is labeled with numbers and letters. All you have to do is take your time and just orient what you’re assembling with the pictures in the instruction book. Once assembled, it’s pretty stable but since it’s a shorter dresser it’s not a problem. The drawers operate so smooth it takes very little effort to open or close them. The top 2 drawers are short but deep. The bottom 2 drawers are wide but on the shallower side. This kid does include support bars for the bottom 2 drawers so the middle doesnt cave in. It’s a really nice touch but given the drawers on the shallow side, I dont know that you could really over load them. It looks nice when it’s done the style will fit any decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not that hard to put together
reviews.reviewText: After reading the reviews on this item was almost afraid to order. But I do like a challenge now and then. The item arrived in two boxes well packed. Yes there are a lot of parts, and yes the unit is heavy (particle board). The instructions are good, you don't even need to know how to read, they are all pictorial. The parts are all numbered and called out on the instructions by these. It took me 2.5 hour to assemble this included unpacking. There are a couple of things to look out for, as I found out during assembly. When attaching the rails to the sides, be sure to orient these as shown on the photo, showing the top of the left side. Also be aware that the rails need to be set back as shown in the next photo. The bottom one is correct the top needed to be redone. This is to allow the drawers to go in all the way do to the fact that they are recessed.And yes the holes are not predrilled for these but are marked and the screws drive easily. Resist any notion of using a power screw driver of any kind, you will strip the wood. The other boo boo was part 6 which I installed back wards. As you can see in the photo the cam locks show. However to reverse at this point would mean to have to disassemble much of this unit. If you are a stickler go ahead or just be sure to orient it correctly when installing. If you like me get it wrong all is not lost because the drawer will cover the mistake. The most tedious part was putting together the drawers, there are 5. Also I found that if you did not get the screws in straight for the rails, the drawers tend to hang up as you open and close them. A little adjustment fixed that, but if you are careful during mounting you can avoid a little frustration later on. You will have some parts left over (hardware) The finished product is stable and sturdy. I am happy with the results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent dresser, but terrible instructions
reviews.reviewText: The end product is ok. Using it for a few items and as a TV stand so it will do. Biggest negatives: 1. Assembly instructions are horrible! Had to disassemble 3 times to get it to go together correctly, so took me @4 hours to do. 2. The last step where you install the drawer slides is terrible due to the fact that there are no predrilled starter holes. Luckily I had a hammer to tap some starter holes myself. I was assembling this dresser at another location and not my home, so did not have my cordless drill ( having one would have made assembly much easier). 3. After all the difficulties assembling, one of the smaller drawers doesn't fit correctly. Gave up trying to figure out why.It is a nice size though, and will serve it's purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks and works great.
reviews.reviewText: Took some time to put together, pretty simple if you follow instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Garbage in the shape of furniture
reviews.reviewText: This is the lowest quality piece of furniture I have ever come across, by a significant margin. The white finish is not uniform and littered with touch ups and apprentice marks.At some point they must have planned for a single knob on the large drawers, as suggested by the hole sloppily covered with brown wood filler in the center of the front panels.Speaking of the knobs; they are made of cheap plastic, with a wafer thin cap to give the appearance that they are made of metal.This piece makes IKEA furniture seem like family heirlooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good furiture, difficult assemby
reviews.reviewText: First, the finished, built unit before we get to assembly. For self-assembly furniture these drawers are sturdy and heavy. The drawer runners are all on wheels like more expensive furniture, and go in and out smoothly. The large drawers have a reinforcement piece running across the middle underside, so no bottoms falling out for this model. It also has real aluminum knobs instead of plastic.Assembly, definitely not for beginners. If you haven't done a lot of assembly, I would think hard before buying this. I've done a lot, and it still took me 4 hours to put this together. I would say this is intermediate difficulty. The drawers come in 25 pieces, plus runners and screws and around 30 other hardware pieces. The main case is another 10-11 pieces with lots of hardware. Some parts need traditional screws without pilot holes Use a drill r electric screw driver or your hands will fall-off.Other Stuff: it comes in 2 boxes and they are not delivered the same day. I talked with the seller when I thought I had missing parts and they were very helpful The two boxes are very heavy. I had to take them up two flights of stairs and with the second box I just opened it and carried the contents up bit by bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A powered driver/drill and small hammer is a MUST
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, just takes a long time, maybe 3-4 hours. A powered driver/drill and small hammer is a MUST to make sure each screw is tight enough. Or else it will take you longer and your hands will hurt if you use a manual screwdriver. I did not have any issues with missing parts or misaligned wood pieces, like other brands.
